nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.33.0 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.33.0 --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.33.0
nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.32.3 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.32.3 --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.32.3
nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.31.6 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.31.6 --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.31.6
